Referrer Policy is set to 'unsafe-url'

Check that all sub-resources get the stripped referrer URL.

The referrer URL is stripped-referrer when a document served over http requires an http sub-resource via xhr-request using the meta-csp delivery method and when the target request is cross-origin.

See specification details for this test.

Scenario outline

Delivery method meta-csp
Origin transition cross-origin
Protocol transition from http to http
Subresource type xhr-request
Expected result Referrer URL should be stripped-referrer
